title: Twisted
description: I’m a bad boy in a good suit.I’ve lived a sexy and fascinating life. I’ve been called a heartbreaker by many women. NI’m a bad boy in a good suit.I’ve lived a sexy and fascinating life. I’ve been called a heartbreaker by many women. Now with my own heart broken, shattered, I have no one to turn to.Or do I?My sexy secretary, Amber has always been at my side. She’s more than just my secretary, she’s my friend, my confidant…Perhaps more….When my dark past begins to stalk me, I find myself even more drawn to her. Behind her blue eyes lurks the same unfulfilled longing that I recognize in my own. The chemistry between us is pulsating with passion and uncontrollable lust.As a mysterious dark haired stranger begins lurking around every corner, events from my past begin to spiral out of control putting us both in the most dangerous situation of our lives.Will I be able to save Amber in time? Will Amber and I finally be together?
author: Ashton Blackthorne
